mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tab_favorite WHERE uid = #{uid} AND rid = #{rid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tab_favorite WHERE rid = #{rid} AND uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(r.rid),r.`rimage`,r.`rname`,r.`price`,f.`date` FROM tab_favorite AS f INNER JOIN tab_route AS r ON f.`rid` = r.`rid` INNER JOIN tab_route_img AS r_i ON r.`rid` = r_i.`rid` WHERE f.`uid` = #{uid} LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tab_favorite WHERE uid = #{uid}

SELECT f.rid,r.`rname`,r.`price`,r.`rimage`,COUNT(DISTINCT(f.uid)) AS num FROM tab_favorite f INNER JOIN tab_route r ON f.`rid` = r.`rid` WHERE 1=1 AND r.`rname` LIKE '%${rname}%' AND r.`price` >= #{gt_price} AND r.`price` <= #{lt_price} GROUP BY f.rid ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT(f.`rid`)) FROM tab_favorite f INNER JOIN tab_route r ON f.`rid` = r.`rid` WHERE 1=1 AND r.`rname` LIKE '%${rname}%' AND r.`price` >= #{gt_price} AND r.`price` <= #{lt_price}
SELECT f.rid,r.`rname`,r.`price`,r.`rimage`,COUNT(DISTINCT(f.uid)) AS num FROM tab_favorite AS f INNER JOIN tab_route r ON f.`rid` = r.`rid` GROUP BY f.rid ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 4
